00029 #ifndef _DYNJOINT_H_
00030 
00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include <map>
00033 #include "matvec3D.h"

00035 class Joint;
00036 class DynamicBody;
00037 class Body;

00040 
00068 class DynJoint {
00069 public:
00070         enum DynamicJointT{FIXED, REVOLUTE, UNIVERSAL, BALL, PRISMATIC};
00071  protected:
00072   
00074   DynamicBody *prevLink;
00075 
00077   DynamicBody *nextLink;
00078 
00080   transf prevFrame;
00081     
00083   transf nextFrame;
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00091   DynJoint(DynamicBody *pLink,DynamicBody *nLink,const transf &pFrame,
00092         const transf &nFrame):
00093     prevLink(pLink),nextLink(nLink),prevFrame(pFrame),nextFrame(nFrame) {}
00094 
00098   virtual void buildConstraints(double *Nu,double *eps,int numBodies,
00099                                                                 std::map<Body*,int> &islandIndices,int &ncn);
00100 
00102   virtual void getConstraints(char *c) = 0;
00103 
00105   virtual void updateValues() = 0;
00106 
00108   virtual transf getNextTrans() = 0;
00109 
00111   virtual transf getPrevTrans() = 0;
00112 
00114   virtual int getNumConstraints()=0;
00115 
00117   DynamicBody *getPrevLink() const {return prevLink;}
00118 
00120   DynamicBody *getNextLink() const {return nextLink;}
00121 
00123   virtual DynamicJointT getType() = 0;
00124 };
00125 
00127 
00132 class FixedDynJoint : public DynJoint {
00133  public:
00138   FixedDynJoint(DynamicBody *pLink,DynamicBody *nLink,
00139                 const transf &pFrame=transf::IDENTITY,
00140                 const transf &nFrame=transf::IDENTITY) :
00141     DynJoint(pLink,nLink,pFrame,nFrame) {}
00142   
00143   virtual int getNumConstraints() {return 6;}
00144 
00146    virtual void getConstraints(char *c) {
00147            c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = c[3] = c[4] = c[5] = 1;
00148    }
00149 
00150    virtual void buildConstraints(double *Nu,double *eps,int numBodies,
00151                                                                 std::map<Body*,int> &islandIndices,int &ncn);
00152 
00153   virtual void updateValues();
00154 
00155   virtual transf getNextTrans(){return transf::IDENTITY;}
00156 
00157   virtual transf getPrevTrans(){return prevFrame;}
00158 
00159   virtual DynamicJointT getType(){return FIXED;}
00160 };

00166 class RevoluteDynJoint : public DynJoint {
00167  protected:  
00169   Joint *joint;
00170 
00171  public:
00172 
00178   RevoluteDynJoint(Joint *j,DynamicBody *pLink,DynamicBody *nLink,
00179                   const transf &pFrame=transf::IDENTITY,
00180                   const transf &nFrame=transf::IDENTITY) :
00181     DynJoint(pLink,nLink,pFrame,nFrame),joint(j) {}
00182   
00183   virtual int getNumConstraints() {return 5;}
00184 
00186   virtual void getConstraints(char *c) {
00187     c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = c[3] = c[4] = 1;
00188         c[5] = 0;
00189   }
00190   virtual transf getNextTrans();
00191 
00192   virtual transf getPrevTrans();
00193 
00194   virtual void updateValues();
00195 
00196   virtual DynamicJointT getType(){return REVOLUTE;}
00197 };

00207 class UniversalDynJoint : public DynJoint {
00208 
00210   Joint *joint1;
00211 
00213   Joint *joint2;
00214 
00215  public:
00216 
00222   UniversalDynJoint(Joint *j1,Joint *j2,DynamicBody *pLink,DynamicBody *nLink,
00223                     const transf &pFrame=transf::IDENTITY,
00224                     const transf &nFrame=transf::IDENTITY) :
00225     DynJoint(pLink,nLink,pFrame,nFrame),joint1(j1),joint2(j2) {}
00226 
00227   virtual int getNumConstraints() {return 4;}
00228 
00230   virtual void getConstraints(char *c) {
00231         c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = c[3] = 1;
00232         c[4] = c[5] = 0;
00233   }
00234 
00235   virtual void updateValues();
00236 
00237    virtual transf getNextTrans(){return transf::IDENTITY;}
00238 
00239    virtual transf getPrevTrans(){return prevFrame;}
00240 
00241   virtual DynamicJointT getType(){return UNIVERSAL;}
00242 };

00250 class BallDynJoint : public DynJoint {
00252   Joint *joint1;
00253 
00255   Joint *joint2;
00256 
00258   Joint *joint3;
00259 
00260  public:
00266   BallDynJoint(Joint *j1,Joint *j2,Joint *j3,DynamicBody *pLink,DynamicBody *nLink,
00267                     const transf &pFrame=transf::IDENTITY,
00268                     const transf &nFrame=transf::IDENTITY) :
00269     DynJoint(pLink,nLink,pFrame,nFrame),joint1(j1),joint2(j2),joint3(j3) {}
00270 
00271   virtual int getNumConstraints() {return 3;}
00272 
00274   virtual void getConstraints(char *c) {
00275     c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = 1;
00276     c[3] = c[4] = c[5] = 0;
00277   }
00278 
00279   virtual void updateValues();
00280 
00281   //TODO fix this if we ever want this working in dynamics
00282   virtual transf getNextTrans(){return transf::IDENTITY;}
00283 
00284   virtual transf getPrevTrans(){return prevFrame;}
00285 
00286   virtual DynamicJointT getType(){return BALL;}
00287 };
